testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder content
steps: Check for multiple interactive elements (buttons, forms, navigation links)
Verify application shows image showcase content, not just 'Vite + React' placeholder
Confirm navigation menu is present and functional
Check for proper page structure with header, main content, and footer
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a functional image showcase platform with navigation, image galleries, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Image Showcase Test
testCases.description: Test that the homepage displays image showcases properly
steps: Wait for image showcases to load
Verify at least 3 image cards are displayed
Check that each image card has title, description, and image
Verify 'View Image' links are present and clickable
Test image loading and display quality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays a grid of image showcases with proper titles, descriptions, and functional view links

testCases.name: Navigation Menu Test
testCases.description: Test all navigation menu items and routing
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible
Click on 'Explore' link and verify it navigates to explore page
Click on 'Featured' link and verify it navigates to featured galleries
Click on 'About' link and verify it navigates to about page
Click on 'Contact' link and verify it navigates to contact page
Verify logo/home link returns to homepage
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly and lead to appropriate pages

testCases.name: Authentication Interface Test
testCases.description: Test login and registration forms are functional
steps: Verify login form is displayed with email and password fields
Click 'create a new account' to switch to registration form
Verify registration form has email, username, password, and confirm password fields
Test form validation by submitting empty forms
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms are properly displayed and have basic validation

testCases.name: User Login Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test user login with valid credentials from seed data
steps: Verify user is redirected to homepage or dashboard
Check that navigation shows authenticated user state
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and sees authenticated interface

testCases.name: User Registration Test
steps: Verify user is automatically logged in after registration
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user account is created and user is automatically authenticated

testCases.name: Image Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image search and filtering capabilities
steps: Look for search functionality or category filters
Verify search results show relevant images
Clear search and verify all images return
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and returns relevant filtered results

testCases.name: Single Image View Test
steps: From homepage, click 'View Image' on any showcase
Check that image is displayed in full size
Verify image title and description are shown
Check for social features (like button, comments section)
Test back navigation to previous page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Individual image pages display complete image details and metadata

testCases.name: Protected Routes Access Test
testCases.description: Test that protected routes require authentication
steps: Verify protected routes are now accessible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users are redirected to login, authenticated users can access protected routes

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Verify image grid displays 4 columns on large screens
Verify image grid adjusts to 2-3 columns
Verify image grid displays single column
Check navigation menu adapts to mobile (hamburger menu)
Verify forms are properly sized on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application layout adapts properly to different screen sizes

testCases.name: Image Upload Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image upload feature for authenticated users
steps: Check for file input, title field, description field, categories field
Test form validation with empty fields
Test file type validation (only images allowed)
Upload a test image with complete metadata
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authenticated users can successfully upload images with metadata

testCases.name: User Dashboard Test
testCases.description: Test user dashboard functionality for authenticated users
steps: Verify user's uploaded images are displayed
Check for user statistics (upload count, likes, etc.)
Verify user can manage their content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard displays user's content and provides management capabilities

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and user feedback
steps: Verify appropriate error message is displayed
Check for loading states during API calls
Test graceful handling of API failures
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application provides clear error messages and handles failures gracefully

testCases.name: Basic Performance Test
steps: Check for lazy loading of images
Verify smooth scrolling through image galleries
Check for any console errors or warnings
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs smoothly during normal usage

testCases.name: Social Features Test
testCases.description: Test social interaction features like likes and comments
steps: Navigate to an image detail page
Look for like button and test clicking it
Test adding a comment (if feature is available)
Test following other users (if feature is available)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features work correctly and provide user feedback
testCases.note: Some social features may be in development

test_execution_notes.authentication_note: Use seed data credentials for login tests
known_limitations: API may return 500 errors if database is not properly seeded
Some protected routes may not be fully implemented
Social features may be in development phase

success_criteria.minimum_passing_rate: 80% of high priority tests must pass
